ChildNodes.Name: Titlescreen
ChildNodes.Description: Texts used in the title screen

ChildNodes.Name: newGame
ChildNodes.Description: The text on a savefile button when the savefile is empty

ChildNodes.Name: timeFormat
ChildNodes.Description:
The time format of the region 
Has to be either "AmPm" or "24H"

ChildNodes.Name: startLabel
ChildNodes.Description: The 'Start game' label for the start-game-button

ChildNodes.Name: deleteConfirmation
ChildNodes.Description: When deleting a savefile, this text pops up and asks for confirmation

ChildNodes.Name: storyHeader
ChildNodes.Description: The header label of the story box; 'The story so far'

ChildNodes.Name: copyHeader
ChildNodes.Description: Asking where to save a copy of the selected file
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Select the slot to copy the file to

ChildNodes.Name: Settings
ChildNodes.Description: Texts used for the Settings menu

ChildNodes.Name: Game
ChildNodes.Description: Texts for the game settings submenu

ChildNodes.Name: sGDepthOfFieldD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The further something is away from the camera, the blurrier it gets

ChildNodes.Name: sGParallaxQualityD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Quality of parallax occlusion mapping effect on textures (virtual texture depth)

ChildNodes.Name: sGGrassDensityD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Amount of grass rendered on surfaces (leftmost will disable grass)

ChildNodes.Name: sInpMode1D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
Use the keyboard to play the game.

Note: Still allows to interact with the UI using the cursor.

ChildNodes.Name: sInpMode2D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
Use a gamepad to play the game.
 Supported controller types:
    • Xbox controller
    • PS4 Controller
    • Switch pro controller

Note: Still allows to interact with the UI using the cursor.

ChildNodes.Name: sInpMode3D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Use solely the cursor (Mouse/Pen) to play the game (like in the original NDS game).

ChildNodes.Name: sDisModeD
ChildNodes.Description: Description for the different Display mode options
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
The display mode of the application:

    Fullscreen - Default fullscreen. Scales the window to the size of the monitor.

    Fullscreen borderless - Like fullscreen, but allows you to tab out of the game without minimizing the window. Might cause performance issues.

    Maximized window - Basically like Fullscreen borderless, but with task bar and window border.
 WARNING! Not supported on Windows OS; Will instead switch to fullscreen borderless.

    Windowed - Regular application window.

ChildNodes.Name: sDisMonitorD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
The monitor that the game should be displayed on (if more than one are available).

    Requires a restart of the game to take action!

ChildNodes.Name: sDisResD
ChildNodes.Description: Description for the different resolution options
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
Changes the render resolution:

    Native - monitor resolution.

    Unity presets -  Allows you to choose from Unitys builtin resolutions, from left (smallest) to right (biggest).

    Custom - Enter a resolution of choice. Minimum resolution is 256 x 192, and ratio can only be between 4:3 and 16:9, to prevent the game from breaking.

ChildNodes.Name: sDisFPSD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
Sets the target framerate.

    Moving the slider leftmost will enable VSync (Double buffering), and moving it rightmost will disable the limit

ChildNodes.Name: sVolTitle
ChildNodes.Description: Title label for the volumes submenu

ChildNodes.Name: sVolMusic
ChildNodes.Description: The label for the music volume option

ChildNodes.Name: sVolMusicD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Changes the volume of the music.

ChildNodes.Name: sVolSFX
ChildNodes.Description: The label for the sounds volume option

ChildNodes.Name: sVolSFXD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Changes the volume of sound effects.

ChildNodes.Name: sVolVoice
ChildNodes.Description: The label for the voices volume option

ChildNodes.Name: sVolVoiceD
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Changes the volume of voice lines.

ChildNodes.Name: graphics1
ChildNodes.Description:
First set of labels for the graphics options: 
 Motion Blur, Texture Quality, Grass Density
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
Motion blur
Texture quality
Grass density

ChildNodes.Name: graphics2
ChildNodes.Description:
Second set of labels for the graphics options: 
 Depth of field

ChildNodes.Name: Title Screen Story Summaries
ChildNodes.Description: Every time the game progresses storywise, the Story summaries on the title screen update, which are all stored here

ChildNodes.Name: storySum1_1
ChildNodes.Description:
"While he was away exploring and solving problems elsewhere, Sonic received a message from Tails:
 Knuckles is missing! 

Tails asked for Sonic's help to track down the Marauders, the mysterious villains who took Knuckles. Sonic returned from afar to help find Knuckles and bring these Marauders to justice! "
ChildNodes.DefaultValue:
While he was away exploring and solving problems elsewhere, Sonic received a message from Tails:
 Knuckles is missing!

Tails asked for Sonic's help to track the Marauders, the mysterious villains who took Knuckles. Sonic returned from afar to help find Knuckles and bring these Marauders to justice!

ChildNodes.Name: Ingame Menu
ChildNodes.Description: Texts used in the ingame menu

ChildNodes.Name: SavEmpty
ChildNodes.Description: When a game file is empty

ChildNodes.Name: SavMessage
ChildNodes.Description: When the user wants to save on a slot which already holds save data; Reminding the user that the existing data will be overwritten
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Are you sure? The selected file will be overwritten

ChildNodes.Name: SavCancel
ChildNodes.Description: 'Cancel'; dont save to the selected slot

ChildNodes.Name: SavRetMessage
ChildNodes.Description: Asking if the user wants to return to the title screen
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Do you want to return to the title screen?

ChildNodes.Name: SavRetConfirm
ChildNodes.Description: Confirming to return to the title screen

ChildNodes.Name: SavRetCancel
ChildNodes.Description: Deciding to continue to play the game

ChildNodes.Name: PrfLevel
ChildNodes.Description: 'Level' label, displays the current level of the character

ChildNodes.Name: PrfClass
ChildNodes.Description: The 'Class' label in the profile menu (the character fighter class)

ChildNodes.Name: PrfNextLvl
ChildNodes.Description: 'Next in' label, displays how many exp remain till the character reaches the next level

ChildNodes.Name: PrfTurns
ChildNodes.Description: 'Turns' label, displays the amount of turns of the character in battles

ChildNodes.Name: PrfSlotEmpty
ChildNodes.Description: Displays whether a characters equipment slot does not hold any gear

ChildNodes.Name: PrfnoEquipSelected
ChildNodes.Description: Used in the equipment info box; Tells the user that no equipment is selected (and thus there is nothing to show in the info box)
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Select an equipment slot, movement ability, or POW move below for more info

ChildNodes.Name: PrfDequip
ChildNodes.Description: When dequipping a piece of equipment

ChildNodes.Name: PrfTestPow
ChildNodes.Description: When selecting a pow move to test

ChildNodes.Name: PrfNoEquip
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The selected equipment slot is empty

ChildNodes.Name: PrfPowLocked
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The selected pow move is locked. Unlock it by leveling up and assigning bonus points to it

ChildNodes.Name: invMenu4
ChildNodes.Description: When the 'Quest items' inventory is active

ChildNodes.Name: unequipItem
ChildNodes.Description: The selected item is equipped and can be unequipped

ChildNodes.Name: useItem
ChildNodes.Description: The selected item can be use/consumed

ChildNodes.Name: equipChao
ChildNodes.Description: The selecte chao can be equipped

ChildNodes.Name: unequipChao
ChildNodes.Description: The selected chao is equipped and can be unequipped

ChildNodes.Name: alreadyEquipped
ChildNodes.Description: The character already has an item/chao of this type equipped

ChildNodes.Name: notEquippable
ChildNodes.Description: The character cant equip this type of item

ChildNodes.Name: noItemThere
ChildNodes.Description: The selected inventory does not hold any items/chao
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: There are no items to display

ChildNodes.Name: Journal menu
ChildNodes.Description: Texts used in the journal menu

ChildNodes.Name: jDefault
ChildNodes.Description: When no entry is selected; After opening the journal
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Select a journal entry from one of the branches to get information about the universe of Sonic Chronicles: the Dark Brotherhood, and much more!

ChildNodes.Name: Overworld map menu
ChildNodes.Description: Texts used in the overworld map menu

ChildNodes.Name: areaDesc1
ChildNodes.Description:
Green Hill Zone description: 
 A tropical paradise that's home to some of the most exotic local wildlife, and with its abstract topography and luscious green grass, it's a popular destination for many travellers.
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A tropical paradise that's home to some of the most exotic local wildlife, and with its abstract topography and luscious green grass, it's a popular destination for many travellers.

ChildNodes.Name: areaDesc2
ChildNodes.Description:
Central City description: 
 An influential hub of commerce and industry, this diverse city is home to everything from a simple curio store to the militaristic G.U.N. Headquarters.
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: An influential hub of commerce and industry, this diverse city is home to everything from a simple curio store to the militaristic G.U.N. Headquarters.

ChildNodes.Name: areaDesc3
ChildNodes.Description:
Mystic Ruins description: 
 This dense jungle was once home to an ancient civilization, which mysteriously disappeared thousands of years ago. Today, all that remains are their ruins, which surround the place with mystery.
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: This dense jungle was once home to an ancient civilization, which mysteriously disappeared thousands of years ago. Today, all that remains are their ruins, which surround the place with mystery.

ChildNodes.Name: areaDesc4
ChildNodes.Description:
Blue Ridge Zone description: 
 A chilly alpine region abundant with snowfall and azure greenery, the survivors of Perfect Chaos eke out a modest lifestyle after Station Square’s destruction.
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A chilly alpine region abundant with snowfall and azure greenery, the survivors of Perfect Chaos eke out a modest lifestyle after Station Square’s destruction.

ChildNodes.Name: areaDesc5
ChildNodes.Description:
Metropolis description: 
 A dystopian wasteland Built by Dr. Ivo 'Eggman' Robotnik, which has fallen to ruin after his defeat several years ago. Now its filled with ghost factories and taskless robots walking around the site.
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A dystopian wasteland Built by Dr. Ivo "Eggman" Robotnik, which has fallen to ruin after his defeat several years ago. Now its filled with ghost factories and taskless robots walking around the site.

ChildNodes.Name: areaDesc6
ChildNodes.Description:
Angel Island description: 
 As the seat of the Master Emerald, this floating island is one of the last relics of an ancient civilization.The Island itself has crashed into the ocean several times in recent years.
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: As the seat of the Master Emerald, this floating island is one of the last relics of an ancient civilization.The Island itself has crashed into the ocean several times in recent years.

ChildNodes.Name: General
ChildNodes.Description: General texts used throughout the entire game

ChildNodes.Name: Stat labels
ChildNodes.Description: Short labels for the stats in all kinds of menus

ChildNodes.Name: Registers
ChildNodes.Description: Everything that gets registered dynamically (characters, world, items, etc)

ChildNodes.Name: Area names
ChildNodes.Description: The names of the areas visited throughout the game

ChildNodes.Name: char_sonic_pow0D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Sonic spindashes into the enemy, directly followed by a jump to deliver a powerful double kick to a single foe.

ChildNodes.Name: char_sonic_pow1D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Sonic runs in circles to create a strong windhose around the enemy team, lashing them all with a powerful wind attack.

ChildNodes.Name: char_sonic_pow2D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Tails carries Sonic over toe a single foe, and throws him  to deliver an extra powerful spinball that has a chance to weaken the target.

ChildNodes.Name: char_sonic_pow3D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Amy uses her hammer to send Sonic spinballing into a foe for a triple attack that might make the target sluggish

ChildNodes.Name: char_sonic_pow4D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails join in on a powerful wind attack that may leave targets Sluggish.

ChildNodes.Name: char_sonic_pow5D
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Knuckles, Tails and Amy smash a spinballing Sonic careening into single target, potentially stunning the foe.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The root of a plant known for its healing effects.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The seed of a plant known for its healing effects.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A vaccine effective in preventing debilitating systems for short periods.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Made with medicine capable of toughening the skin for short periods. Moderately increases armor.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: An alien device that produces an energy pulse that heals all party members. Restores HP

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A refreshing formula that invigorates mind and body.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Made with an extract guaranteed to improve combat abilities for short periods.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A rare concoction capable of providing heightened premonition for short periods.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: An alien device that produces an energy pulse that invigorates all party members.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD77

Revival Ring:

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A ring with the power to put the fallen back on their feet. Revives one KO'ed team member.

Ring of Life:
"A ring with the power to put the fallen back into fighting shape. Revives one KO'ed team member."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A ring with the power to put the fallen back into fighting shape. Revives one KO'ed team member.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD79
ChildNodes.Description:
Rock Salt:
"A rare earth extract capable of raising one's raw strength for short periods. Moderately increases damage."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A rare earth extract capable of raising one's raw strength for short periods. Moderately increases damage.

Speed Bar:

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Made with medicine capable of boosting one's re?exes for short periods of time.

Beam Cannon:

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A non-lethal weapon created to banish the Marauders without harming them.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Kron Colony.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the N'rrgal Colony.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Nocturne.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A device used by the Marauders to keep in touch with their base.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A device that detects Eggman's electronic signature.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD91
ChildNodes.Description:
Eggman Device:
"A device built by Eggman. It doesn't seem to do anything."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A device built by Eggman. It doesn't seem to do anything.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD92
ChildNodes.Description:
GUN Official:
" "Please, no time to talk. I must return to Station Square. I'm very important, you know!" "
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: "Please, no time to talk. I must return to Station Square. I'm very important, you know!"

ChildNodes.Name: itemD93
ChildNodes.Description:
Little Boy:
" "Thanks so much for saving me, Sonic! Please take me home to Central City!" "
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: "Thanks so much for saving me, Sonic! Please take me home to Central City!"

ChildNodes.Name: itemD94
ChildNodes.Description:
Nocturnes Tech:
"A piece of Nocturnus Clan technology so advanced that even Tails can't figure out its function."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A piece of Nocturnus Clan technology so advanced that even Tails can't figure out its function.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD95
ChildNodes.Description:
Pattern Generator:
"A device that generates code patterns that interfere with energy fields."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A device that generates code patterns that interfere with energy fields.

ChildNodes.Description:

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A stone tablet covered in strange writing.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD97
ChildNodes.Description:
Prized Stapler:
"A stunningly beautiful device, when you really look at it."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A stunningly beautiful device, when you really look at it.

ChildNodes.Name: itemD98
ChildNodes.Description:
Timothy:
" "My dad isn't really crazy, just old. He'll be glad to see me, I know." "
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: "My dad isn't really crazy, just old. He'll be glad to see me, I know."

ChildNodes.Name: itemD99
ChildNodes.Description:
Weapon Part:
"A part needed for Eggman and Tails to create their ultimate weapon."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A part needed for Eggman and Tails to create their ultimate weapon.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A crate filled with N'rrgal Sweat. Ew!

Kron Payment:

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The payment for the N'rrgal Sweat delivery, addressed to the N'rrgal Trader.

ChildNodes.Name: Chao descriptions
ChildNodes.Description: Descriptions for the ability of each Chao

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD1
ChildNodes.Description:
Barbo:
"Increases Maximum HP of bonded character."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Increases Maximum HP of bonded character.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD2
ChildNodes.Description:
Belgog:
"Bonded character is much harder to hit."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character is much harder to hit.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD3
ChildNodes.Description:
Bepke:
"At least one enemy will automatically attack the bonded character instead of other team members."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: At least one enemy will automatically attack the bonded character instead of other team members.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD4
ChildNodes.Description:
Blayze:
"Bonded character does much more damage in battle."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character does much more damage in battle.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD5
ChildNodes.Description:
Bobo:
"Bonded character will always find an extra reward item after combat."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character will always find an extra reward item after combat.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD6
ChildNodes.Description:
Cheese:
"Greatly increases luck of all team members."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Greatly increases luck of all team members.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD7
ChildNodes.Description:
Cheezlet:
"Bonded character does more damage in battle."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character does more damage in battle.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD8
ChildNodes.Description:
Choo:
"Bonded character regenerates PP at the start of each combat round."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character regenerates PP at the start of each combat round.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD9
ChildNodes.Description:
Choopaloo:
"Increases XP gained from each battle."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Increases XP gained from each battle.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD10
ChildNodes.Description:
Churdle:
"Bonded character has a better chance of hitting targets in battle."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character has a better chance of hitting targets in battle.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD11
ChildNodes.Description:
Dusty:
"Increases the chance that the team will catch a fleeing opponent."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Increases the chance that the team will catch a fleeing opponent.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD12
ChildNodes.Description:
Ferox:
"Bonded character automatically succeeds using their POW moves."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character automatically succeeds using their POW moves.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD13
ChildNodes.Description:
Fess:
"Increases the odds that Chao eggs will hatch rare or unique Chao."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Increases the odds that Chao eggs will hatch rare or unique Chao.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD14
ChildNodes.Description:
Ghise:
"Bonded character's attacks do Water damage."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character's attacks do Water damage.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD15

Gibber:
"Bonded character has greatly increased resistance to damage."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character has greatly increased resistance to damage.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD16

Griff:
"Bonded character's attacks do Ice damage."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character's attacks do Ice damage.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD17
ChildNodes.Description:
Hayda:
"Regenerates PP at the start of each combat round for all team members."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Regenerates PP at the start of each combat round for all team members.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD18
ChildNodes.Description:
Jirna:
"Chao creates an earth shield to protect against damage."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Chao creates an earth shield to protect against damage.

ChildNodes.Name: chaoD19
ChildNodes.Description:
Joy:
"Regenerates HP at the start of each combat round for all team members."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Regenerates HP at the start of each combat round for all team members.

Kayla:
"Reduces the team's chance of being ambushed."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Reduces the team's chance of being ambushed.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Increases odds of enemies fleeing from battle.

"Bonded character is harder to hit."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character is harder to hit.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Chao creates a shield of fire to protect against damage.

Luunan:
"Greatly increases the maximum PP of bonded character."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Greatly increases the maximum PP of bonded character.

ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Bonded character has a greatly increased chance to hit targets in battle.

ChildNodes.Name: Story Dialogs
ChildNodes.Description: Dialogs that are played or change with the progression of the game

ChildNodes.Name: StoryDialogue 1-1
ChildNodes.Description: The conversation between Tails and Sonic after Sonic arrives in Green Hill

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_1
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Sonic, you made it! I'm so glad to hear from you!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Sonic, you made it! I'm so glad to hear from you!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_2
ChildNodes.Description:
Sonic:
"I'm here, Tails. What's going on?"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: I'm here, Tails. What's going on?

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_3
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"We're in big trouble, Sonic. Knuckles has gone missing. And so have the Chaos Emeralds!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: We're in big trouble, Sonic. Knuckles has gone missing. And so have the Chaos Emeralds!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_4
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"A group of criminals called the Marauders kidnapped him! We need your help!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: A group of criminals called the Marauders kidnapped him! We need your help!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_6
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"I knew you would! I just knew it!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: I knew you would! I just knew it!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_7
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"I can see you on my Monitors, so even if I'm not with you, I'll guide you if you have any trouble."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: I can see you on my Monitors, so even if I'm not with you, I'll guide you if you have any trouble.

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_8
ChildNodes.Description:
Sonic:
"What else do you know about the situation?"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: What else do you know about the situation?

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_9
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Knuckles was fighting against the Marauders when he disappeared. We're not really sure who they are, but they're bad news!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Knuckles was fighting against the Marauders when he disappeared. We're not really sure who they are, but they're bad news!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_10
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Please Sonic. I'll explain more when you get here! We're losing time!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Please Sonic. I'll explain more when you get here! We're losing time!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_11
ChildNodes.Description:
Sonic:
"Wait, they took the Chaos Emeralds too?"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Wait, they took the Chaos Emeralds too?

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_12
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"They did! And that means trouble!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: They did! And that means trouble!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_13
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"The Chaos Emeralds are powerful gems, Sonic. Someone who knows how to use them could do just about anything with their power!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: The Chaos Emeralds are powerful gems, Sonic. Someone who knows how to use them could do just about anything with their power!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_14
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"You know how you've used all the 7 Chaos Emeralds? By using their power to become Super Sonic, you were pretty much unbeatable!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: You know how you've used all the 7 Chaos Emeralds? By using their power to become Super Sonic, you were pretty much unbeatable!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_15
ChildNodes.Description:
Sonic:
"Well Yeah! How could i ever forget?"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Well Yeah! How could i ever forget?

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_16
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Without knowing who the Marauders are, there's no telling what they'll do with the Chaos Emeralds. We have to stop them!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Without knowing who the Marauders are, there's no telling what they'll do with the Chaos Emeralds. We have to stop them!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_18
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Amy is on her way to meet you. Once you find her, meet me at my workshop near Central City."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Amy is on her way to meet you. Once you find her, meet me at my workshop near Central City.

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_19
ChildNodes.Description:
Sonic:
"Sounds like a plan. I'll be there in a flash!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Sounds like a plan. I'll be there in a flash!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_20
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Great! Thanks, Sonic. With you on our side, I know we'll save Knuckles!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Great! Thanks, Sonic. With you on our side, I know we'll save Knuckles!

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_21
ChildNodes.Description:
Sonic:
"O-Oh! ... A-Amy's tagging along? H-How quaint..."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: O-Oh! ... A-Amy's tagging along? H-How quaint...

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_22
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"Well, you know how she is. She wanted to meet you halfway and make sure you got here safely."
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: Well, you know how she is. She wanted to meet you halfway and make sure you got here safely.

ChildNodes.Name: c1sd1_23
ChildNodes.Description:
Tails:
"I'll wait for you in the workshop. With you on the team, I know we'll save Knuckles!"
ChildNodes.DefaultValue: I'll wait for you in the workshop. With you on the team, I know we'll save Knuckles!
